sect2.title: 1. First draft of XML Document
sect2.para: The document follows the structure below: <movies> <movie availability="prime"> <title>Title</title> <release>Year</release> <country>Country</country> <genre>Genre</genre> <director> <first_name>Michael</first_name> <last_name>Mann</last_name> </director> <rating>10</rating> </movie> </movies>

sect2.title: 2. CSS-Stylesheet
sect2.para: The colors are based on the CI of our university. The sheet is named style.css and located within the project folder.

sect2.title: 3. DTD Validation
sect2.para: For now, the validation is done within the movies.xml file.
